SELECT MDI_CLSCODE, MDI_NAME FROM MF_DRUG_INFO WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND MDI_DrugCode_Seq = '0'
AND MDI_NAME LIKE '%' || #{schKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY MDI_CLSCODE
select MDI_CLSCODE, MDI_NAME from mf_drug_info WHERE CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' and MDI_DrugCode_Seq = '0' and MDI_CLSCODE = #{MDI_CLSCODE} group by MDI_CLSCODE,MDI_NAME order by MDI_CLSCODE
